control_attributes.control_description: The organization: a. Categorizes information and the information system in accordance with applicable federal laws, Executive Orders, directives, policies, regulations, standards, and guidance;b. Documents the security categorization results (including supporting rationale) in the security plan for the information system; andc. Ensures that the authorizing official or authorizing official designated representative reviews and approves the security categorization decision.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to compare the results of vulnerability scans over time to determine trends in information system vulnerabilities.
